title: Q6 Introduction Constructed Response
prompt: Compose a sentence that effectively introduces the ideas in the paragraph
description:
Read this paragraph.

While the so-called “stars” of reality television shows may not be reading from scripts, they are often placed in unnatural situations or contexts and directed to respond in a particular manner. Producers of these shows manipulate the participants by creating dramatic conflicts and manipulate audiences by claiming that what is shown is “real life.” Even when participants are behaving without directions, it is still inaccurate to characterize their behavior as “real” or “authentic.” The simple presence of cameras and the knowledge that their performance will be watched by millions of viewers causes people to act quite differently than they would if the cameras were off.
feedback: Thank you for your response. It will be graded promptly.
